snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include police going undercover to stop the sales of stolen cellphones, an argument that no one can look good wearing...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include police going undercover to stop the sales of stolen cellphones, an argument that no one can look good wearing Google Glass and a look through the eyes of a driverless car.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Flying Robot Insects and Drawing With Molecules
